profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If itâ€™s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:

profile:
Mint Roofing Ltd. is a professional roofing contractor that serves residential and commercial property owners in Durham and York Regions.
Our firm is fully licensed, certified and insured. We carry over $ 5 million of liability coverage which provides our clients and contractors peace of mind and protection.

Our team of trained consultants have over 30 years of industry experience and have proudly served thousands of clients across the GTA including home owners, business owners, engineer firms, restoration and insurance companies.

Our business model is a simple one however we mean every word

-  Provide honest advice and exceptional service
-  Keep our promises EVERY time
-  Only install high quality products that provide our clients warranty coverage and protection
- Treat our clients and their homes with unparalleled respect
  
  Do all of these things for an affordable and fair price 
 
Mint Roofing Ltd. have the knowledge, experience and capacity to tackle any roofing, siding, eavestrough or insulation project. 
The team members are easy to work with and respect our clients busy schedules, we will make every effort to meet you at a time that is convenient for you.
We welcome the opportunity to meet with you to review your project, answer any questions or concerns that you have, and ensure that you are educated and comfortable with the products, offerings and options that we recommend for your home or business.

We hope to serve you soon, for more information please visit our website or contact us by phone today

profile:
People's Choice Home Improvements has been proudly serving the Durham Region for over 20 years. We specialize in the supply and installation of high quality energy efficient windows and doors. Our company works closely with our manufactures to make sure that we exceed our clients expectations by offering high quality products and exceptional workmanship. We strive to offer our services at an affordable price for every homeowners budget. We work with you on your vision of what product you want from the moment we walk through your door; style, shape, colour, glass options, etc. We take pride in not only specializing in the installation of windows and doors, but we also offer many other exceptional services such as, siding, trough/soffit/fascia, garage doors, capping, railings, porch enclosures. 

We are committed to providing you with a high level of service and satisfaction. Our goal is to leave a great impression of our services with our customers.

profile: Danforth Rd. Roofing & Contracting has been serving the G.T.A. since 1990.  We are a family owned business and our goal is customer satisfaction -- treating your home as if it were our own.  Communication with the homeowner is our first priority which creates an open and honest relationship for both.  We thank you in advance for the opportunity to bid your project.  If you choose us, we will do everything to make your project move as quickly and smoothly as possible.  No decisions or changes will be made without discussing the same with the homeowners first.  As in any big renovation, unforeseen things do come up.  If this should happen, we will explain everything to our client so they understand it completely.  We look forward to working with you and making your home renovation a pleasant experience.  Work will commence seven (7) days upon acceptance of this proposal.
